examples.example: 这一拨优秀的年轻人充满活力与创造力，为社会带来了许多积极的改变。

translate.english: This group of excellent young people is full of vitality and creativity, and has brought a lot of positive changes to the society.

examples.example: 在这次活动中，这一拨志愿者表现得非常出色，赢得了大家的称赞。

translate.english: In this activity, this group of volunteers performed extremely well and won everyone's praise.

examples.example: 在新的学期里，这一拨新生都朝气蓬勃，对未来充满了期待。

translate.english: In the new semester, this batch of freshmen are all full of vigor and vitality and full of expectations for the future.
